StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SP_P_PROCESS179]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS SET ARITHABORT OFF set arithignore on set ansi_warnings o.
declare @person_id int, @su.cd varchar(5), @ssn varchar(9), @l.rst varchar(20), @lmiddle varchar(20), @llast varchar(20), @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me, @numrows_upd int, @numrows_add int, @arms_update int, @arms_total int, @numrows_upd_c char(9), @numrows_add_c char(9), @arms_update_c char(9), @arms_added_c char(9)
declare arms_179 cursor for select substring(SSN,1,9), FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, MID_INITIAL from arms..ARMS179
open arms_179
fetch arms_179 into @ssn, @l.rst, @llast, @lmiddle
select @su.cd = NULL select @arms_update = 0 select @arms_total = 0 select @numrows_upd = 0 select @numrows_add = 0 select @user_login = 'migra.on' select @update_date = getdate()
set @arms_update = (select count(*) from arms..ARMS179 where @ssn in (select SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER from mcriss..PERSON)) set @arms_total = (select count(*) from arms..ARMS179)
while (@@FETCH_STATUS = 0) begin
if (not exists(select 1 from mcriss..PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ssn)) begin exec SPADDPERSONTBL @su.cd,@ssn,@l.rst,@lmiddle,@llast,@user_login,@update_date print "SSN ADDED " print @ssn select @numrows_add = @numrows_add + 1 end else begin select @person_id = (select PERSON_ID from mcriss..PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ssn) exec SPUPDPERSONTBL @person_id,@su.cd,@ssn,@l.rst,@lmiddle,@llast,@user_login,@update_date print "SSN UPDATED " print @ssn select @numrows_upd = @numrows_upd + 1 end
fetch arms_179 into @ssn, @l.rst, @llast, @lmiddle
end
print " " print " " print "===============================================================" print "SUMMARY OF DAILY CHANGES" print "===============================================================" print "number of new rows from ARMS" select @arms_added_c = @arms_total - @arms_update print @arms_added_c print "number of rows updated from ARMS" select @arms_update_c = @arms_update print @arms_update_c print "number of new rows added to MCRISS" select @numrows_add_c = @numrows_add print @numrows_add_c print "number of rows updated to MCRISS" select @numrows_upd_c = @numrows_upd print @numrows_upd_c
close arms_179
deallocate arms_179
